thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Robin
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Robin

author: Robin
title: Robin
text: They were able to change our booking on short notice so we could rent a bigger car than we originally thought was needed. Shuttle van was there on time after calling their 0800 number. Car wasn't as clean as I would have liked but traveling around the South Island comes with a certain level of dust from unsealed roads. No problem with the level of customer service.
